content:
Folgrit (The Watchful Mother) [LG]

Folgrit is the wife of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Torag]{Torag}, and thus has a prominent role in the dwarven pantheon, having mothered several demigod children. She is patient with her husband and tries to stop him worrying too much, but also makes sure he is aware of the burden of responsibility he bears. Folgrit is the goddess of wives, mothers, and children, and tangentially the goddess of widows and orphans.

Edicts Maintain the sanctity of a home, remain patient with others, take in those without families

Anathema Abandon your family, fail to defend your neighbors

Follower Alignments LG, NG, LN

Devotee Benefits

Divine Ability Constitution or Wisdom
Divine Font heal
Divine Skill Medicine
Favored Weapon staff
Domains cities, family, protection, repose
Cleric Spells 1st: endure, 4th: fire shield, 9th: resplendent mansion
name: Folgrit
